item.title: By: Kevin L.
item.dc:creator: Kevin L.
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/grokking-es6-promises-the-four-functions-you-need-to-avoid-callback-hell/#comment-320">jamesknelson</a>.
Aren't Observables an option as well if you're recommending ES7-level stuff?
Things like critical data that can be retried or aborted would be a better fit.
Being lazily done rather than being hot, Observables can be advantageous for certain async operations than Promises as well.
